item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I did only SINGLE MISSIONS A DAY! I think Nana make her bloody sister just SHUT UP O_O and do not drop/change anything. If u do not believe/agree/etc/ GO AND CHECK URSELF! :)

P.S. At team order Nana is more left than Euth btw.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Just because you got nothing one day doesn't mean she doesn't drop anything. It could just be bad luck. That said, there could be some interference with Nana causing them to be Freshly-wrapped, while Euth normally drops Flash-Frozen due to her ability. Nana could be overwriting her drop effect, while her script could be checking for Flash Frozen and getting an error. Spend a day doing non-megamissions and see if she drops anything with Nana. If she still doesn't, bug report.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
nana+euth+cici2 and I found:

Ally Drop!
Freshly-Wrapped Package!
Cici drops a package of mystery food!
(Total: 1) …
Ally Drop!
Freshly-Wrapped Bundle!
Nana unloads some stuffs from the back!
(Total: 1) …

Euth gave nothing…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Actually, from the looks of it, you can't get meats out of freshly-wrapped. So it's frozen for the meats, fresh for the veggies, and flash-frozen for everything, including the bullets and flakes.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: doesn't list possible teams. Also, if you team up Nana and Euth, what do you get?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
As I understand it:
Frozen: Dough, Sauce, Cheese, Meat
Freshly Wrapped (Nana's effect): Everything from Frozen, plus Veggies.
Flash-Frozen (Euthanasia's effect): Everything

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So what does it mean by the drops becoming flash-frozen? Do frozen packages/boxes give better or worse stuff than frost-covered?
